entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is a goblin who is present in the scene. He is described as 'maddeningly' and has a great domed head and short legs.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who is present in the scene. He starts to speak angrily but is nudged by Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends who is present in the scene. She nudges Ron and pulls him away from the door.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is present in the scene. He thanks Griphook and takes the sword of Gryffindor.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as someone whose bed Griphook sits on.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned as someone whose bed Griphook sits on.

entities.name: skele-gro
entities.description: Skele-Gro is a treatment that has finished its work according to Griphook.

entities.name: sword of gryffindor
entities.description: The sword of Gryffindor is taken by Harry from beside the goblin.

entities.name: horcrux
entities.description: Hermione and Ron discuss a possible Horcrux in the Lestranges vault.

entities.name: lestrange's vault
entities.description: The Lestranges vault is mentioned as a possible location of a Horcrux.

relationships.description: Harry takes the sword of Gryffindor from beside Griphook.
Hermione pulls Ron away from the door.
Harry mentions a possible Horcrux in the Lestranges vault.
Hermione and Ron discuss a possible Horcrux in the Lestranges vault.
